about_the_game:
Map Collection - Nautical

50 Encounter Maps for your TTRPG games!

Have your players wandered off the beaten path and now you're scrambling to pull up a map for a random encounter? Look no further!

The Nautical Map Collection contains 50 encounter maps that you can easily drop into your long-running campaigns, suitable for any seafaring or costal area. Each map takes advantage of Dynamic Lighting & Effects.

Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by: Jason Copeland

Requires: An active subscription or a one time purchase of a Fantasy Grounds Full or Ultimate license and any ruleset. Compatible with Fantasy Grounds Unity or Fantasy Grounds Classic

Screenshots may differ from what you see in-game based on the extension and ruleset you have loaded and if you are running Fantasy Grounds or Fantasy Grounds Unity.
